name: keyword
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool semrush_magic_tool.
Tool description: Keyword Magic Tool. Find millions of keyword suggestions for your SEO. 
API description: Find long-tail keywords up to 10000. find Keyword, Volume, CPC (USD), Intent, Keyword Difficulty,  SERP Features, Trend.

keyword.description: The keyword to search data for.
